attributes.action: Keep dance classes open in covid 19 its a learning activity
attributes.additional_details: I have a 3 year old girl that been doing dance for nearly 2 years and she love it she dances where ever she goes she has become so good at this and so has so many in her dance class the classes are kept separate and all the girls love going to dance to express all there emotion and release all there energy they all keep there distance from each other and all understand whats going on so why can't they stay open this isn't fair children need routine and stability
attributes.background: I want dance classes to stay open in covid 19 its a learning activity and is a way children express  there emotion and energy

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557275
